name: Loopy (itch) (Flying Basement Studios)
description:
Help Loopy the robot to get ouf of a spaceship by telling him which instructions should he execute. Brace yourself as the journey to freedom is long and challenging. 

This game was created as an entry for Ludum Dare 47 (72 hours JAM version).

Theme: Stuck in a Loop

Note: All levels are tested and it is possible to finish them.  If you get stucked feel free to contact us.

CONTROLS:
The game is controlled by mouse. In the control panel you can drag and drop the instructions into the memory slots. 

TEAM MEMBERS:
Jiří Filek - programming, level design
Martina Fusková - UI, sound effects, catering
Eve - graphics
HaF - soundtrack
Luke - glockenspiel in soundtrack (single tact), game testing
